= Introduction =

As far as this project is concerned a gadget is small, DHTML (HTML+CSS+JavaScript) based application.  Typically run inside (i.e.: on a web page) or by a browser (ex.: [http://dev.opera.com/articles/widgets/ Opera widgets]) but other user agents are possible (ex.: [http://www.adobe.com/devnet/air/ Adobe AIR]).
